import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; let wheel = document.getElementById('wheel'); let resetBtn = document.getElementsByClassName('reset-btn')[0]; let rotation = 0; let scale = 1; let slowingDown = false; let pressed = {}; window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown, false); window.addEventListener('keyup', handleKeyUp, false); function handleKeyDown(e) { if (e.keyCode === 32 && slowingDown === false) { animateKeyOut(); if (pressed[e.which]) return; pressed[e.which] = e.timeStamp; } }; function handleKeyUp(e) { if (e.keyCode === 32) { animateKeyIn(); spinThatWheel(e); } }; function animateKeyOut() { scale -= 0.03; if (scale < 0.5) return; TweenMax.to(resetBtn, 0.5, {ease: Sine.easeOut, scale: scale}); } function animateKeyIn() { scale = 1; TweenMax.to(resetBtn, 0.25, {scale: scale}); } function spinThatWheel(e) { if ( !pressed[e.which] ) return; let duration = Math.floor((e.timeStamp - pressed[e.which]) / 75); if (duration > 100) duration = 100; animateWheel(duration); slowingDown = true; pressed[e.which] = 0; }; // function spinThatWheel() { // // if ( !pressed[e.which] ) return; // let duration = Math.floor((90)); // if (duration > 100) duration = 100; // animateWheel(duration); // slowingDown = true; // // pressed[e.which] = 0; // }; function animateWheel(duration) { let randomNum = Math.floor((Math.random() * 10)); rotation += (30 * duration) + (30 * randomNum); TweenMax.to(wheel, 10, { ease: Power4.easeOut, rotation: rotation, onComplete: guess }); } function guess() { var x = prompt('Enter your guess:'); var x = x.toUpperCase(); if(x =='H' || x=='A' || x =='P' || x =='Y' || x =='S' || x=='T' || x=='D' || x=='F' || x=='R' || x=='O' || x=='M' || x=='W' || x=='N'){ updateGameBoard(x); } else{ alert('Sorry wrong answer, try again!'); } resetWheel(); } function updateGameBoard(x) { var store = document.querySelectorAll('.inner ' +'.' +x); for(var i=0; i'; } //document.querySelectorAll('.inner .P').innerHTML = '

P

'; } function resetWheel() { slowingDown = false; }; function App() { return (
